lines:
Guh-Aisle-Guh-Eye: Hail, young adventurer!
I am Guh-Aisle-Guh-Eye, a helpful golden chanterelle!
Fungus McShroom: Guile! We've met before! Can't you remember?

Guh-Aisle-Guh-Eye: No, actually.
Isn't Guile one of the castle dwellers?
Fungus McShroom: What did you call yourself again?
Guh-Aisle-Guh-Eye: GUH-AISLE-GUH-EYE!
Fungus McShroom: I'm sorry but you all sound the same to me.

Guh-Aisle-Guh-Eye: Must be the text color.
Anyway, can I teach you a spell?

options.text: I'd like to attack more powerfully.

lines: Fungus McShroom: I'd like to dash faster.
Guh-Aisle-Guh-Eye: Great choice! A precise dash can save your life!
Fungus McShroom: I'd like to attack more powerfully.
Guh-Aisle-Guh-Eye: Great choice! A decisive bash can save your life!

Guh-Aisle-Guh-Eye: Fungus McShroom, the one and only!
What can I do for you?

options.text: How do you know my name?
Why do you all have the same name?

lines: Fungus McShroom: How do you know my name?
Guh-Aisle-Guh-Eye: Fungus, you're a celebrity around here!
Fungus McShroom: Really?

Guh-Aisle-Guh-Eye: No, but it's something you can
say that sounds trustworthy in such situations.
Fungus McShroom: Where are we?
Guh-Aisle-Guh-Eye: We're east of Strawberry Milk Lake.

Guh-Aisle-Guh-Eye: There's the Minty Mountains directly to the north,
but they are really dangerous.
Guh-Aisle-Guh-Eye: Some say there's an ancient storage room somewhere inside.
Fungus McShroom: Why do you all have the same name?
Guh-Aisle-Guh-Eye: I don't understand. My name is unique.
